SELECT P.NO, P.CATEGORY, P.NAME, P.PRICE, P.CONTENT, P.COMPANY, P.DISCOUNTRATE, P.SELLING, P.STATUS, P.IMAGE, P.WISH, D.COLOR, D.SIZE_SML, D.STOCK FROM PRODUCT P JOIN DETAIL D ON P.NO = D.productNo WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NO DESC
